82 typedef enum {
83  icSeekSet=0, //Seek to an absolute position
84  icSeekCur, //Seek to relative position
85  icSeekEnd, //Seek relative to the ending
86 } icSeekVal;

96 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccIO
97 {
98 public:
99 
100  virtual ~CIccIO() {}
101 
102  virtual void Close() {}
103 
104  virtual icInt32Number Read8(void *pBuf8, icInt32Number nNum=1) { return 0; }
105  virtual icInt32Number Write8(void *pBuf8, icInt32Number nNum=1) { return 0; }
106 
107  icInt32Number ReadLine(void *pBuf8, icInt32Number nNum=256);
108 
109  icInt32Number Read16(void *pBuf16, icInt32Number nNum=1);
110  icInt32Number Write16(void *pBuf16, icInt32Number nNum=1);
111 
112  icInt32Number Read32(void *pBuf32, icInt32Number nNum=1);
113  icInt32Number Write32(void *pBuf32, icInt32Number nNum=1);
114 
115  icInt32Number Read64(void *pBuf64, icInt32Number nNum=1);
116  icInt32Number Write64(void *pBuf64, icInt32Number nNum=1);
117 
118  icInt32Number Read8Float(void *pBufFloat, icInt32Number nNum=1);
119  icInt32Number Write8Float(void *pBuf16, icInt32Number nNum=1);
120 
121  icInt32Number Read16Float(void *pBufFloat, icInt32Number nNum=1);
122  icInt32Number Write16Float(void *pBuf16, icInt32Number nNum=1);
123 
124  icInt32Number ReadFloat32Float(void *pBufFloat, icInt32Number nNum=1);
125  icInt32Number WriteFloat32Float(void *pBufFloat, icInt32Number nNum=1);
126 
127  virtual icInt32Number GetLength() {return 0;}
128 
129  virtual icInt32Number Seek(icInt32Number nOffset, icSeekVal pos) {return -1;}
130  virtual icInt32Number Tell() {return 0;}
131 
133  bool Align32();
134 
136  bool Sync32(icUInt32Number nOffset=0);
137 };

146 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccFileIO : public CIccIO
147 {
148 public:
149  CIccFileIO();
150  virtual ~CIccFileIO();
151 
152  bool Open(const icChar *szFilename, const icChar *szAttr);
153 #if defined(WIN32) || defined(WIN64)
154  bool Open(const icWChar *szFilename, const icWChar *szAttr);
155 #endif
156  virtual void Close();
157 
158  virtual icInt32Number Read8(void *pBuf, icInt32Number nNum=1);
159  virtual icInt32Number Write8(void *pBuf, icInt32Number nNum=1);
160 
161  virtual icInt32Number GetLength();
162 
163  virtual icInt32Number Seek(icInt32Number nOffset, icSeekVal pos);
164  virtual icInt32Number Tell();
165 
166 protected:
167  FILE *m_fFile;
168 };

177 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccMemIO : public CIccIO
178 {
179 public:
180  CIccMemIO();
181  virtual ~CIccMemIO();
182 
183  bool Alloc(icUInt32Number nSize, bool bWrite = false);
184 
185  bool Attach(icUInt8Number *pData, icUInt32Number nSize, bool bWrite=false);
186  virtual void Close();
187 
188  virtual icInt32Number Read8(void *pBuf, icInt32Number nNum=1);
189  virtual icInt32Number Write8(void *pBuf, icInt32Number nNum=1);
190 
191  virtual icInt32Number GetLength();
192 
193  virtual icInt32Number Seek(icInt32Number nOffset, icSeekVal pos);
194  virtual icInt32Number Tell();
195 
196  icUInt8Number *GetData() { return m_pData; }
197 
198 protected:
199  icUInt8Number *m_pData;
200  icUInt32Number m_nSize;
201  icUInt32Number m_nAvail;
202  icUInt32Number m_nPos;
203 
204  bool m_bFreeData;
205 };

214 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccNullIO : public CIccIO
215 {
216 public:
217  CIccNullIO();
218  virtual ~CIccNullIO();
219 
220  //Open resets the file to being zero size
221  void Open();
222  virtual void Close();
223 
224 
225  virtual icInt32Number Read8(void *pBuf, icInt32Number nNum=1); //Read zero's into buf
226  virtual icInt32Number Write8(void *pBuf, icInt32Number nNum=1);
227 
228  virtual icInt32Number GetLength();
229 
230  virtual icInt32Number Seek(icInt32Number nOffset, icSeekVal pos);
231  virtual icInt32Number Tell();
232 
233 protected:
234  icUInt32Number m_nSize;
235  icUInt32Number m_nPos;
236 };
